# Quick Start Guide

## Installation

```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Link globally (makes xs-lint and xs-setup available everywhere)
npm link

# Test the CLI
xs-lint --help
xs-setup --help
```

## Automatic Claude Code Integration

```bash
# Go to your XanoScript project
cd /path/to/your/xanoscript-project

# Run automatic setup
xs-setup

# Done! Claude Code integration is now active:
# - Automatic validation after every file edit
# - /xs-lint command available
# - xs-lint CLI available in terminal
```

## Basic Usage

### 1. Validate All .xs Files
```bash
node bin/xs-lint.js
```

### 2. Validate Specific Files
```bash
node bin/xs-lint.js test/example.xs
```

### 3. Get JSON Output
```bash
node bin/xs-lint.js --json
```

## Use with Claude Code

This repository includes a built-in Claude Code slash command!

### In Claude Code:
```
/xs-lint
```

This will:
1. Validate all `.xs` files in your project
2. Show you the errors
3. Offer to fix them automatically
4. Re-validate to confirm fixes

## Global Installation (Optional)

```bash
# Link globally
npm link

# Now you can use from anywhere:
xs-lint
```
